an3.26:1.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:1.4: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:1.5: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:1.6: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo?
an3.26:1.7: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo hīno hoti sīlena samādhinā paññāya.
an3.26:1.8: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampā.
an3.26:2.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo?
an3.26:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sadiso hoti sīlena samādhinā paññāya.
an3.26:2.3: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:2.5: Sīlasāmaññagatānaṁ sataṁ sīlakathā ca no bhavissati, sā ca no pavattinī bhavissati, sā ca no phāsu bhavissati.
an3.26:2.6: Samādhisāmaññagatānaṁ sataṁ samādhikathā ca no bhavissati, sā ca no pavattinī bhavissati, sā ca no phāsu bhavissati.
an3.26:2.7: Paññāsāmaññagatānaṁ sataṁ paññākathā ca no bhavissati, sā ca no pavattinī bhavissati, sā ca no phāsu bhavissatīti.
an3.26:2.8: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:3.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo?
an3.26:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo adhiko hoti sīlena samādhinā paññāya.
an3.26:3.3: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:3.5: Iti aparipūraṁ vā sīlakkhandhaṁ paripūressāmi, paripūraṁ vā sīlakkhandhaṁ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmi;
an3.26:3.6: aparipūraṁ vā samādhikkhandhaṁ paripūressāmi, paripūraṁ vā samādhikkhandhaṁ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmi;
an3.26:3.7: aparipūraṁ vā paññākkhandhaṁ paripūressāmi, paripūraṁ vā paññākkhandhaṁ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti.
an3.26:3.8: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
an3.26:3.9: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasminti.
